text: iRewind is a German technology firm which develops video software products for sports industry. The company was bought in 2017 by Swiss company Yoveo. iRewind was established in 2013 by six persons: Christian Mauriand, Bogdan Manoiu, David De Picciotto, Salvador Garcia Zalduegui, Mihai Nicolescu, and David Delarive. title: IRewind
